Index#

Document structure mapping for papers and books.

class papercutter.index.indexer.DocumentIndex[source]#

Complete index of a document.

id: str#
file: str#
pages: int#
type: Literal['paper', 'book']#
title: Optional[str] = None#
authors: list[str]#
abstract: Optional[str] = None#
sections: list[Section]#
chapters: list[dict[str, Any]]#
tables: list[TableInfo]#
figures: list[FigureInfo]#
refs_count: int = 0#

class papercutter.index.indexer.DocumentIndexer[source]#

Index documents by detecting structure and content.

SECTION_PATTERNS = ['^(\\d+\\.?\\s+)(Introduction|Background|Literature Review|Related Work)', '^(\\d+\\.?\\s+)(Methods?|Methodology|Data|Materials?)', '^(\\d+\\.?\\s+)(Results?|Findings|Analysis)', '^(\\d+\\.?\\s+)(Discussion|Conclusions?|Summary)', '^(\\d+\\.?\\s+)(References?|Bibliography)', '^(\\d+\\.?\\s+)(Appendix|Appendices)', '^([IVXLC]+\\.?\\s+)(Introduction|Methods?|Results?|Discussion|Conclusions?)', '^(Abstract)$', '^(Introduction)$', '^(Methods?|Methodology)$', '^(Data and Methods?)$', '^(Results?)$', '^(Discussion)$', '^(Conclusions?)$', '^(References?|Bibliography)$']#
ABSTRACT_PATTERNS = ['(?:^|\\n)Abstract[:\\s]*\\n(.+?)(?=\\n\\s*\\n|\\nIntroduction|\\n1\\.)', '(?:^|\\n)ABSTRACT[:\\s]*\\n(.+?)(?=\\n\\s*\\n|\\nINTRODUCTION|\\n1\\.)']#
__init__(use_cache=True, parallel=False)[source]#

Initialize the indexer.

Parameters:

  • use_cache (bool) Whether to use caching.

  • parallel (bool) Enable parallel processing for large documents.

index(pdf_path, doc_type=None, force=False)[source]#

Index a PDF document.

Parameters:

  • pdf_path (Path) Path to the PDF file.

  • doc_type (Optional[Literal['paper', 'book']]) Document type (auto-detected if not specified).

  • force (bool) Force re-indexing even if cached.

Return type:

DocumentIndex

Returns:

DocumentIndex with structure information.
